INSTRUCTIONS_LADDER_LINK_P1: To view your ladder in a standard web browser, use the following link:
INSTRUCTIONS_EMBED_LADDER_P1: To embed your ladder in a web page, use the following code as a starting point:
INSTRUCTIONS_EMBED_LADDER_P2: You can change the style to match the layout you would like. The width of the iframe will determine the number of columns that are used.
INSTRUCTIONS_OPTIONAL_PARAMS_P1: You can add the following optional parameters to the end of the URL (or in the embedded URL). Each parameter should be preceded by a semi-colon.
INSTRUCTIONS_OPTIONAL_PARAMS_LI1: lang=<language code>: Set the language used to display the ladder. Defaults to English.
INSTRUCTIONS_OPTIONAL_PARAMS_LI2: showAvatars=<'true' or 'false'>: Show or hide competitor's avatars. Defaults to true.
INSTRUCTIONS_OPTIONAL_PARAMS_LI3: showFullNames=<'true' or 'false'>: Display the competitor's full names below their display names. Defaults to true.
